diff_act: 2.Reports any incidents of data corruption to ensure data integrity
3.initiate a pre-defined recovery procedure to restore affected data from backups

regen.absent_element: detailed recovery procedures and how they are initiated
regen.new_specification: The system shall define and implement a pre-defined recovery procedure to restore affected data from backups in case of data loss or corruption.
The system shall initiate a pre-defined recovery procedure to restore affected data from backups in case of data corruption during Archival Storage transfers.
The system shall report errors immediately upon detection during archival storage transfers and log these incidents for audit purposes.

label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery
